content: What is the capital of France?
The capital of France is Paris.
Paris has a rich history dating back to Roman times. It became the capital of France in the 10th century and has been a center of culture, art, and politics ever since.
Paris is famous for many landmarks including the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral, the Arc de Triomphe, and the Champs-Élysées.
What's the best time to visit?
The best time to visit Paris is during spring (April-June) or fall (September-November) when the weather is mild and the crowds are smaller than in summer.
Paris has excellent dining options at all price points. For fine dining, try Le Cinq or L'Ambroisie. For bistros, check out Le Comptoir du Panthéon or Chez l'Ami Jean.
